alert.note: Alert for Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 9:49AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A shower with small hail will impact portions of east central Marin and southeastern Sonoma Counties through 1015 AM PDT... At 948 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower with small hail near Petaluma, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Cloud to ground lightning may also occur. Locations impacted include... Petaluma, Novato, Temelec and Glen Ellen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this shower and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys
